ModMetaData.name: Adjustable Age
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Lets you specify an age range for newly spawned pawns. Play on a planet of toddlers, or one of geriatrics!
Age range applies only to humanoids. Does not apply to newborns. Allowed ages can be changed mid-game, but will only apply to new pawns. Existing pawns, including AI pawns, will age at the normal rate.
Can be added or removed mid-game.
Requires Harmony.
-----
Github: https://github.com/Zylleon/AdjustableAge/releases/latest Discord: https://discord.gg/4EFv76C ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/zylleon My other mods: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197998830956/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100
